What would you like to place on Reserves?

All NYC campuses will be providing digital Course Reserves only for the Fall 2020 semester.

  • "> Article
  • &CourseID=<#COURSE field="CourseID">"> Chapter
  • &CourseID=<#COURSE field="CourseID">"> Book
  • &CourseID=<#COURSE field="CourseID">"> E-Book (Use Book Form for Shanghai Campus)
  • &CourseID=<#COURSE field="CourseID">"> Video/Audio

Or would you like to import from another course?

<#TABLE name="Course" class="instructor-table filterTable" Type="Import" headerText="Current and Previous Courses" Session="PreviousOrCurrent" Role="Instructor" column="Semester:Semester" column="CourseNumber:Course" column="CourseCode:Course Code" column="Name:Name" column="ReserveItems:Reserve Items" NoDataAction="ShowMessage" NoDataMessage="No courses found." orderby="C.StopDate DESC,C.CourseNumber ASC">
